sources.title: In His Father's Shoes | FULL MOVIE | Family Fantasy Drama
sources.description:
When Clay puts on a pair of his late father's shoes, he is magically transported back in time to his dad's early life. Will visiting the past help his present grief or disrupt his future?

#drama #family #freemoviesonline #timetravel #sciencefiction #fantasy #feelgood #inspirational #blackcinema #magic

metadata.Plot: When his father suddenly dies, Clay Crosby is devastated. It seems he'll never be able to get over the loss. But everything changes when the boy puts on a pair of his father's wingtip shoes, which magically bring him back in time to experience his father's early life. As Clay gets to know his dad in the past, he gains an improved outlook on his own life. And, by changing the past, he wonders if it might be possible to create a better future.
metadata.Actors: Louis Gossett Jr., Barbara Eve Harris, Rachael Crawford
